entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure: RawGetMethodTable() on linux-arm #74895
  • [Mono] Eventpipe Runtime Test Failures on iOS Simulator #74891
  • TarWriter allows to write invalid link entries that are unable to extract #74887
    8.0.0
  • JIT: JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_gc_val_1_d/expl_gc_val_1_d failing under random jit stress #74878
    8.0.0
  • JIT: GC\API\GC\GetTotalPauseDuration failing in experimental pipeline #74877
    8.0.0
  • JIT: OSR stress tests hitting post-phase asserts #74876
    8.0.0
  • PGO work planned for .NET 8 #74873
    8.0.0
  • Uri gives surprising result when given a relativeUri that looks absolute #74869
  • Deadlock when enumerating resources with ResourceManager #74868
  • JIT: Reconsider how to represent defs/uses of CPU flags (GTF_SET_FLAGS) #74867
    Future
  • ./src/tests/run.sh fails to run #74866
  • Blazor wasm aot is not ahead of time #74864
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.WildcardExpressions api #74862
  • XmlSqlBinaryReader is not working in .Net6 #74852

Closed

  • Mono Framework package is from an unidentified developer #74844
  • Assert failure: SyncTableEntry::GetSyncTableEntry()[sbIndex].m_Object == obj #74741
    7.0.0
  • Test failed: baseservices_threading._generics_WaitCallback_thread22_thread22_._generics_WaitCallback_thread22_thread22_sh #13174
    Future
  • Test failed: baseservices_threading._generics_Monitor_EnterExit10_EnterExit10_._generics_Monitor_EnterExit10_EnterExit10_sh #13117
    Future
  • Test failed: baseservices_threading._events_EventWaitHandle_unit_ManualConstructTrue_ManualConstructTrue_._events_EventWaitHandle_unit_ManualConstructTrue_ManualConstructTrue_cmd #12899
    Future
  • [x64/Windows] waitone2 test failures #10181
    Future
  • [x64/Ubuntu] Failure in JitStress=2 JitStressRegs=4 job #10177
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices_threading._coverage_Nullref_CS_TimerNullRefEx_CS_TimerNullRefEx_/_coverage_Nullref_CS_TimerNullRefEx_CS_TimerNullRefEx_cmd #9686
    Future
  • Titr #74882
  • Update Third-party-notices file in 7.0 installers #74605
    7.0.0
  • NetworkStream.BeginRead not conforming to the contract #69269
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Size regression #74506
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize<T>() in Blazor wasm is very slow #72969
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix issue #74741 - assert failure during weak pointer scanning. #74894
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Change some exception types thrown in Tar APIs #74893
    area-System.IO
  • Disallow TarWriter from writing link entries without LinkName set #74892
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix `JSExport` on struct and records #74890
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • [NativeAOT] Save full ARM64 SIMD arg registers in UniversalTransition #74888
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Revert change in StringBuilder.Append(char) #74885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn compiler with RefSafetyRulesAttribute support #74883
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix use of uninitialized memory for Vector3 constants #74880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stage spmi aspnet collection through the repo artifacts dir #74879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix inclusion for tests/run.sh (#74866) #74875
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Update gRPC client tests pipeline #74874
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Speedup Vector128.Shuffle with SIMD #74872
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove outdated comment #74871
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Add Vector128 SQRT intrinsics for amd64 #74865
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add nullability annotation on CacheControlHeaderValue #74863
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Disable nullability warnings in JSON source generator #74861
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix GetTempFileName() on Windows #74855
    area-System.IO
  • [ARM64] - `IsValidCompareChain` should return `false` if both operands are not integral types #74853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/7.0] [mono] Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74881
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix issue #74741 - assert failure during weak pointer scanning. #74810
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix `JSExport` on struct and records #74763
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Split `runtime-wasm` pipeline into `runtime-wasm-libtests`, and `runtime-wasm-non-libtests` #74859
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix use of uninitialized memory for Vector3 constants #74857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #74792 (Roslyn issue 63617) #74804
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • appstart benchmark improvements #74799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] trim System.Private.Uri.dll #74826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update LifetimeTrackingHttpMessageHandler.cs #74833
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74638
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable #74828
    area-System.Transactions
  • [wasm] shorten JSInterop bench detection phase #74802
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Extensions.Logging.Console: Only check for Android/Apple mobile on netcoreapp configs #74798
    os-android, area-Extensions-Logging, os-maccatalyst
  • Disable nullability warnings in JSON source generator #74801
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Do not R2R NativeAOT compiler on ARM64 machines #74856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Avoid duplicate jobs in `runtime-wasm` #74837
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74834
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Issue was that if a BGC thread handles a mark stack overflow, #74814
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ppc64le] Bug fixes #74800
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Clean up remnants of Crossgen1 from test scripts and pipelines #74803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix buffer overruns in GC code #74847
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix conservative stack reporting #74849
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • Run code quality analyzers in the coreclr/tools directory #74825
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Add host trace message to indicate runtimeconfig was not found #74829
    area-Host
  • Change some exception types thrown in Tar APIs #74845
    area-System.IO
  • AOT ILC using a LKG bits #74435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #74147
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • CI: Reduce the unrelated jobs running on wasm only PRs #74601
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix VS component versions #74324
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.x
  • add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #74831
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • improve hanling of TLS certificates on Linux #74695
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. #74749
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix `fgNoStructParamPromotion` #74807
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Preference sources of copy-like casts to destinations #74777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft] Update il range in optOptimizeBoolsUpdateTrees #74657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Ignoring all protocol extension messages that are not supported on .net6 #74836
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Sort out side of GetChildKeys #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet dev-certs https --export-path fails with UnauthorizedAccessException #27604
  • interactive restore failing in latest net7 sdks #27597
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • Microsoft.Dotnet.Compatibility analyzer doesn't work with the NumericIntPtr feature #25566
    7.0.1xx
  • [NetSDKE2E]With NET7 RC1 VAL build installed, install Maui workload in CLI failed with error "microsoft.maui.core.ref.android not found in Nuget feeds...". #27582
  • workload list: `WorkloadManifestCompositionException: Could not find workload microsoft-net-runtime-android-net6 #27587
  • [NetSDKE2E] Error "does not verify: no digest" occurs when installing SDK 6.0.401 on RedHat 8.6 #27523

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1980158 #27608
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1980134 #27606
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Lead to `dotnet new create <template name>` #27593
  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1977737 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • apicompat: treat IntPtr as nint and UIntPtr as nuint #27601
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #27193
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1958018 #27252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update AOT test (#27334) #27574
    Area-Infrastructure
  • added typo correction for `dotnet new` instantiate #27265
    area: dotnet new
  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
    area: dotnet new

Updated

  • Don't run CG in public builds #27269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add error when failing to resolve SDK with workload sdk resolver #27432
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27438
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Lock net5 sdk packages #27179
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update minimum msbuild for RC2 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update our helix pre-download code to try to pre-download for non-windows legs as well. #27306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 7.0.1xx rc1 to rc2 #27568
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles fails if the files are un-parsable #63711
    17.4
  • Cache FileIdentifier on CSharpSyntaxTree #63706
  • FAR doesn't build the code correctly when there are multiple "nested" classifications #63702
  • Holding CTRL does not always produce navigatable targets #63694
    17.4
  • CTRL+Click does not navigate in Decompiled document #63693
    17.4
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63692
    17.4
  • Remove special case in PEModuleSymbol.UseUpdatedEscapeRules for module referencing System.Runtime 7.0 #63691
  • Stack overflow in roslyn while compiling `System.Private.CoreLib` in `dotnet/runtime` #63689

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32831.189 #63704
  • RemoteSymbolFinderService gold bars with missing required document #63682
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix numbering conflict in enum due to merge #63710
    Area-Compilers
  • Prioritize results from the current document if all other things are equal in a nav-to result #63709
    Area-IDE
  • Fail when brace matcher finds no matching spans #63708
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update the DartLab Template branch to main #63707
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use IsKeyboardFocusWithin instead of FocusLost #63705
    Area-IDE
  • Unify implementation of 'go to defintion' and 'go to definition on hover' #63703
    Area-IDE
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE
  • Do not remove a VBImport if it would cause an ambiguity issue. #63700
    Area-IDE
  • WIP #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • <experiment> #63695
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63688
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Re-introduce main-vs-deps #63680
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63697
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure we look for source-generated documents when making an OOP call #63683
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63686
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Method group defaults #63673
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade System.Memory to fully fix another MSBuild loading issue #63545
    Area-IDE
  • Build only test projects and split out building TFMs into separate queues #63677
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Editorconfig diagnostics #63580
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add feature to recommend making a struct 'readonly' when all its fields are already readonly. #63668
    Area-IDE
  • Report an error for an unsupported type tests involving 'ref' structs. #63646
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix race condition in analyzer driver for computing nodes to analyze … #63665
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Fix completion service for providers with text view roles #63685
    Area-IDE
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't include syntax tree's contents when throwing NFWs #63653
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it possible to use PKCE - Proof Key for Code Exchange on Azure AD App Registration + Blazor Server ? How to do it? #43668
  • Kestrel doesn't reject some invalid Transfer-Encoding headers #43664
    6.0.x
  • SPA proxying breaks with double-slash at beginning of path #43662
  • Certificate authentication fails validation when intermediate certificate isn't in store against TLS specification #43661
  • Machine to machine communication does not work as a client in appsettings.json #43656
  • User.Identity.IsAuthenticated.IsAuthenticated returns true when action method is decorated with [AllowAnonymous] attribute #43653
  • ANCM native module hanging in early initialisation #43651

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm Published Failed with Lazy Loading #42336
    7.0-rc2
  • [Routing] Significant performance regression when using a simple MapControllerRoute instead of MapGet on a bare-bones/starter .net 6 app (running on Azure App Service) #39250
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update SPA templates to remove all deprecation warnings #43094
    7.0-rc2
  • RazorRuntimeCompilation 6.0.5 incomaptible with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common 4.2.0 #42182
    7.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext_nodejs #43592
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #43600
  • Perf improvement: json, json #43609
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, plaintext #43373
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext, plaintext_actix #43266
  • Perf improvement: json, json_netty, plaintext_nodejs #43197
  • Perf improvement: json #43005
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, plaintext_actix #42984
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, fortunes_dapper, json_nodejs, plaintext #42912
  • Perf regression: json_netty, json_nodejs, mapaction, plaintext_nodejs #41903
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix, fortunes_ef, mvc #41902
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext_netty, plaintext_nodejs, plainTextEmptyFilter #41437
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #41292
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #40434
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, multiple_queries #40239
  • Perf improvement: single_query #43633
  • Kestrel TimingPipeFlusher calling WriteAsync when another write is pending, causing an exception (SSL) #43625
  • [Blazor] Add support for confirming navigations #40149
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add method to indicate an event handler should enforce value consistency #17281
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Default Templates with scoped css are not actually applied #43659
  • Add auxiliary routes to Router #43654
  • FileUpload: Did not receive any data in the allotted time. #38842
    Backlog
  • Add support for custom handling of Android back button in Blazor Hybrid apps #43650

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Handle Transfer-Encoding edge cases #43671
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [SignalR] Handle wrong type from client result #43670
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr
  • [7.0] Handle Transfer-Encoding edge cases #43669
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Unskip tests now that Runtime bug is fixed #43667
  • [release/3.1] Stop building on Ubuntu 18.04 #43666
  • Update SpaProxy.cs #43663
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43647
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Improve port search retry logic #43557
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Set `MSBUILDLOGALLENVIRONMENTVARIABLES` in most CI jobs #43644
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Use normal `$(_BuildArgs)` in internal jobs w/ binlogs #43597
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Require preview features for most quic options #43639
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Skip output caching for keys with delimiters #43553
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Hot reload: Acknowledge Blazor component parameter removal #43418
    area-blazor, feature-hot-reload
  • [Blazor] Fix redirect to login #43520
    area-mvc
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md #43627
    area-infrastructure
  • Pin language version in release branch #43628
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1979557 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] CarouselView DataTemplateSelector NullReferenceException #9833
  • Xaml for MAUI tvOS and Android TV #9829
  • [Android] Scrolls conflicts with nested ScrollView(s) (CarouselView, CollectionView, ListView) #9827
  • [iOS] Wrong sizing of layouts #9825
  • Control Templates do not have a way to access elements in Control Templates #9817
    Backlog
  • Add IsTrimmable=False attribute to non-trimmable assemblies #9816
    7.0-rc2
  • Slider issues on Windows and macOS #9812
  • Border in ScrollView will flicker when scroll on Android #9805
    Backlog
  • Add support for custom handling of Android back button in Blazor Hybrid apps #9804
    Backlog
  • Changing properties on MauiIcon, MauiImage and MauiSplashScreen sometimes does not regenerate images #9803
    7.0
  • [Bug] FlyoutPage's FlyoutLayoutBehavior value is always 'Split' on Android, causing it unable to manually set IsPresented = false properly #9801
  • Pair to Mac failed with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten' version '6.0.4' is lower..." #9800

Closed

  • [Android] ContentViewHandler is incompatible #7884
  • Server-side rendering support #9537
  • The CreatePlatformView is never called? #9720
  • Add better support for Android 12+ Splash Screen APIs #9794
    6.0-sr5
  • MediaPicker returns the page set by default in the shell #9810
    Backlog
  • Set or Get Row & Column Properties. #9774
  • Was the issue with MAUI project templates appearing for VS Preview resolved? #9777
  • get_IsLoaded throws ObjectDisposed exception #9806
    6.0-sr5
  • Cannot scroll Scrollview on iOS when content dynamically resized #9798

  • SwipeView in CollectionView Faults on Windows #9423
    Backlog

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 3.x or EFClassic 6 for full framework project? #28941
  • EF Core global query filter based on nullable property resulting in NullReferenceException #28940
  • Move internal extension method classes #28938
  • The DbContext self entity tracing will affect the working of global filter on navigation properties #28936
  • ObjectDisposedException when DbContext.ChangeTracker is accessed immediately after the DbContext construction. #28935
  • [net 6.0] [linux] Microsoft.Data.SqlClient is not supported on this platform #28934
  • Mapping attribute (aka data annotation) for property mapped to JSON column #28933
    Backlog
  • Temporal tables are not supported for table splitting but no table splitting is used #28931
  • How to query array contains array with Azure CosmosDB with EFCore #28929

Closed

  • EF5 to EF6 getting 'Unable to translate set operation when matching columns on both sides have different store types.' #28865
  • 7.0 API Reviews #27588
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Calling SaveChanges multiple times sometimes throws with JSON types #28813
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Unexpected cycles detected by `BatchingTopologicalSort` in latest preview #28065
    7.0.0-rc2
  • New EF7 Optimization of Insert query fails on tables with Triggers #28897
  • Translation of method 'string.Format' failed - EF error. #28894
  • Use Custom SqlCLR Aggregate Functions in EF7 #28893
  • Simplify calls to date nested in strftime #25027
    7.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Differentiate between a sequence's database schema and model schema #28943
  • Sproc fixes #28942
  • Avoid cascade cycles on SQL Server for derived-type referencing many-to-many #28937

Merged

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet version #28901
  • SQLite Query: Simplify nested date() calls #28928
  • Fully-qualify ExpressionPrinter in DebuggerDisplay #28932
  • Stop setting JSON array entities' state to Modified in SaveChanges #28926
  • Make filtered unique index update dependencies soft so they can be broken if there's a cycle, since they might not be enforced in the database. #28923

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28908

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why is the arm64 sdk found on x64 machines? #14421

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #14422

Merged

  • Update implicit versions for the September release #14423
  • Move RemoveVersions logic of SdkContentTests to before the file diff #14420

Updated

  • Don't run CG in public builds #14348
  • Eliminate 7.0 source-build prebuilts #14167
  • Add Alpine CI for source-build #14417
  • Fix VS.Redist versions #14402
